properties.Name: VendorFinanceTerm

Columns.Name: VendorId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Vendor.

Columns.Name: FinanceTermId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Finance Term.

Columns.Name: MinimumTransactionAmount
Columns.Description: The minimum transaction amount in the associated transaction range for which the associated Finance Term(s) are acceptable or applicable.

Columns.Name: MaximumTransactionAmount
Columns.Description: The maximum transaction amount in the associated transaction range for which the associated Finance Term(s) are acceptable or applicable.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the associated data is effective.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the associated data is effective.

Columns.Name: VendorFinanceTermNote
Columns.Description: Notes, comments or additional information regarding the Vendor Finance Term.
